attributes.action: leave smokers with the right of choice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I feel that smokers are having there basic human rights taken away from them wih all the anti smoking lobby. as for baning smoking in private cars what will be next , the baning of radio`s.
What has happend to freedom of choice in this country.We should be allowed the choice.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
